<!-- Describe your changes in detail -->

## Type of Change

<!-- Mark with an 'x' the type that applies -->

- [ ] `feat:` New feature (minor version bump)
- [ ] `fix:` Bug fix (patch version bump)
- [ ] `perf:` Performance improvement (patch version bump)
- [ ] `docs:` Documentation changes (patch version bump)
- [ ] `refactor:` Code refactoring (patch version bump)
- [ ] `test:` Adding or updating tests (no version bump)
- [ ] `chore:` Maintenance tasks (no version bump)
- [ ] `ci:` CI/CD changes (no version bump)
- [ ] `BREAKING CHANGE:` Breaking change (major version bump)

## Commit Message Preview

<!-- This will be used for the release notes -->

```
<type>: <description>

<!-- Optional detailed explanation -->
```

**Example:**

```
feat: add Docker build workflow

Adds a reusable workflow for building Docker images with multi-platform support.
```

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the conventional commit format
- [ ] I have updated documentation if needed
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works (if applicable)

## Release Impact

<!-- Will this PR trigger a release when merged to main? -->

- [ ] Yes, this will create a new release
- [ ] No, this is a chore/test/ci change
